content: 3 times 21 away the ends 6 feet make four using yarn color a i made one foot with yarn color c so it looks like the mummy is still bandaged around one foot row 1 make 5 single_crochet in a magic_ring 5 row 4-6 single_crochet in each st around 12 row 2 5 increase 10 row 7 *5 single_crochet 1 increase* 2 times 14 row 3 *4 single_crochet 1 increase* 2 times 12 row 8 13 single_crochet 1 sl 14 row 9 fold the foot in half with the loop in the right corner chain 2 make a single_crochet in the second chain from the hook insert the hook in the stitches to the left and right of the one with the chains yarn over and pull through to make a slip stich from now on work through both the front and back stitches to close the foot 2 sl chain 2 1 single_crochet in the second chain from the hook 3 sl 2 chain 1 single_crochet in second chain from hook finnish off in the last remaining stich and work away the ends fabulous freddie the pharaoh mummy © 2024 acanthus crochet 6 fold the foot in half with the loop in the chain two right corner make a single_crochet into the second chain insert the hook in the stitches to the left from the hook and right of the one with the chains yarn over and pull through both stitches as make two more slip stitches through both well as the loop already on the hook to the front and back stitches before chaining make a slip_stitch two to start the next toe fabulous freddie the pharaoh mummy © 2024 acanthus crochet 7 back legs make two using yarn color a row 1 make 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 row 20 single_crochet in each st around finish off and leave a long tail 6 row 2-19 single_crochet in each st around 6 front legs make two using yarn color a row 1 make 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 row 2-4 single_crochet in each st around 6 row 5 6 single_crochet finish off and leave a long tail 6 crown crown of lower egypt make one in yarn color b the crown is made from the top down in continuous rounds row 1 make 6sc in a magic_ring 6 row 8 *5 single_crochet increase* 3 times 21 row 2-3 single_crochet in each st around 6 row 9 3 single_crochet increase *6 single_crochet increase* 2 times 3 single_crochet 24 row 4 *1 single_crochet increase* 3 times 9 row 10-16 single_crochet in each around 24 row 5 *2 single_crochet increase* 3 times 12 row 17 23 single_crochet 1 sl finish off and work row 6 *3 single_crochet increase* 3 times 15 away the tail 24 row 7 *4 single_crochet increase* 3 times 18 fabulous freddie the pharaoh mummy © 2024 acanthus crochet 8 crown of upper egypt make one in yarn color d the crown is made from
